short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically switch to antifandom (togglable). The mirror margins are adjusted to resemble fandom more closely.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple +and clean redirection plugin to switch between fandom.com domain and https://antifandom.com/ mirrors.
I am not affiliated with neither Fandom nor BreezeWiki.
